name: fractions
description: A Better Partner Dashboard for Medium
author: Can Durmus <@candurmuss>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rm -rf build.zip && parcel build manifest.json && cp manifest.v3.json dist/manifest.json && 7z a -tzip build.zip -w ./dist/*
scripts.build:report: rm -rf dist && rm -rf build.zip && parcel build manifest.json --reporter @parcel/reporter-bundle-analyzer && cp manifest.v3.json dist/manifest.json && 7z a -tzip build.zip -w ./dist/*
scripts.analyze: npm run build:report && parcel serve parcel-bundle-reports/default.html --open
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m "%npm_config_message%" && git push origin main
